profile.title: About Me
profile.description: As a developer, I have acquired technical skills in several programming languages, such as C, C++, Javascript & Typescript with the React framework. I have also gained knowledge about entrepreneurship, as well as the ability to pitch a project during my startup experiences. Additionally, as a coach and active member of the sports committee of a badminton club, I have developed skills in management, coaching, and organizing sporting events.

delmonicos.title: Delmonicos - Developer | React / Node JS
delmonicos.description: Delmonicos is developing an ecosystem to facilitate access to charging stations for electric vehicles. As a member of a team managing the integration of the web application, I participated in the development of the back-end integration with the OCPI protocol and developed the front-end interface of the application. I was also involved in creative decisions related to the front end. And I have presented twice at CES.

iel.title: IEL Services - Developer | React Native
iel.description: As the head of this project, I worked on developing the mobile application for CRM management in React Native.

vivoka.title: Vivoka - Developer | C++
vivoka.description: As part of the development of the KNX module for the Zac home automation system. I integrated the KNX API to manipulate light, shutters, radiators, ... With C++ language.

formation.title: Education
formation.subtitle: EPITECH LYON (Master) - [2017 - 2022]
formation.description: I obtained my computer science degree from EPITECH University, where I acquired solid skills in software development, database management, and user interface design.

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: I master several programming languages and frameworks, such as :

languages.title: Languages
languages.description: I am fluent in French, which is my native language, I speak English professionally, and I have basic knowledge of German.
